ssGUI
namespace
ssGUI
ssGUI::​EventCallbackManager
ssGUI::​EventCallbackManager
ssGUI::​GUIObject

This manages all the EventCallbacks for a GUI Object

Variables & Constructor
protected:
    std::unordered_map<ssGUI::Enums::EventType, ssGUI::EventCallback*> EventCallbacks;      //See <GetEventCallback>
    ssGUI::Renderer* CurrentRenderer;                                                       //(Internal variable) Used for sending redraw signal
    ssGUI::GUIObject* CurrentObject;                                                        //(Internal variable) Used to register container
EventCallbackManager::EventCallbackManager() :  EventCallbacks(),
                                                CurrentRenderer(nullptr),
                                                CurrentObject(nullptr)
{}
Functions
SetDependentComponents
virtual void SetDependentComponents(
ssGUI::Renderer* renderer,
ssGUI::GUIObject* obj
)

(Internal ssGUI function) Sets the required compnents for this to work

AddEventCallback
virtual ssGUI::EventCallback* AddEventCallback(
ssGUI::Enums::EventType eventType
)

Adds an eventCallback to this GUI Object. If the eventCallback already exists, nothing will be modified.

AddEventCallbackCopy
virtual ssGUI::EventCallback* AddEventCallbackCopy(
ssGUI::EventCallback* copy,
bool copyListeners
)

Adds an eventCallback to this GUI Object by copying an already existing eventCallback.  If an eventCallback already exists in this GUI object, nothing will be modified.

GetEventCallback
virtual ssGUI::EventCallback* GetEventCallback(
ssGUI::Enums::EventType eventType
)

Gets the eventCallback by the name of it

IsEventCallbackExist
virtual bool IsEventCallbackExist(
ssGUI::Enums::EventType eventType
) const

Returns true if the eventCallback exists on this GUI Object

RemoveEventCallback
virtual void RemoveEventCallback(
ssGUI::Enums::EventType eventType
)

Removes the eventCallback by the name of it

GetListOfEventCallbacks
virtual std::vector<ssGUI::EventCallback*> GetListOfEventCallbacks()

Returns all the event callbacks on the GUI Object

ForwardEvent
virtual void ForwardEvent(
ssGUI::GUIObject* objToForwardTo,
ssGUI::Enums::EventType forwardEvent
)

Forwards the specified event we received to the specified GUI Object
